thread.title: Edith Gore
thread.title_full: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc reviewed by Edith Gore

author: Edith Gore
title: Edith Gore
text:
Today when I went out to my car there was a flat tire. Uggggh. Well I don't live far from TFT. So I drove slow, Hazard lights on and made my way there. Alvin the attendant was ready to help. With his expertise and kindness I was on my way with a new tire. I was so impressed with the service, I scheduled a appt. Another true and front wheel alignment. When I have tire drama TFT is where I'm going!!!!
Thank you guys..
Edith Gore
